product.longDescription: Abundant yields of 15–20 gm. fruits with classic grape shape and addictive flavor. Moderately sized plants are easy to manage. Strongly branched, yet tidy clusters can regularly set impressive fruit loads without bending. The high yields, however, do not sacrifice any rich grape flavor. A must-try for any grape tomato lover! High resistance to Fusarium wilt races 1 and 2, leaf mold, and tomato mosaic virus; intermediate resistance to gray leaf spot and nematodes. Indeterminate. Avg. 242,600 seeds/lb. Packet: 15 seeds.
product.shortDescription: New! Highly productive grape tomato with leaf mold resistance.
